message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $160.
I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I understand that $160 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $152.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I'm willing to compromise further, Bob. I can sell it to you for $145.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $145. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $135?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell it to you for $142.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $142, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $132?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell it to you for $138.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $139. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $139?
